label: 式家
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: The ceremonial Lineage" of Fujiwara Fuhito's offspring, specifically the lineage of the third son, Umakai. Umakai served as head of the Shikibushō and thus his descendants were given this associative appellation. [藤原不比等、宇合（うまかい）、式部省] "
